short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes text that says Trump to nicknames such as The Talking Yam, The Angry Cheeto, and many more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension changes text both on a google search and on websites such as online newspapers. It changes different names for Donald Trump into nicknames such as The Talking Yam, The Angry Cheeto, and many more. To enable and disable, go to chrome://extensions, and check or uncheck the box next to the extension.
